svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/144.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/144.0.0.0" version="29.3.7"> <diagram name="RISC-V 5-Stage Pipeline" id="pipeline"> <mxGraphModel dx="1034" dy="564" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="1600" pageHeight="900" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="stage_if" parent="1" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=14;" value="<b>IF</b><br>Instruction Fetch" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="40" width="140" x="120" y="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="stage_id" parent="1" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=14;" value="<b>ID</b><br>Instruction Decode" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="40" width="140" x="360" y="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="stage_ex" parent="1" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=14;" value="<b>EX</b><br>Execute" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="40" width="140" x="600" y="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="stage_mem" parent="1" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=14;" value="<b>MEM</b><br>Memory Access" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="40" width="140" x="840" y="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="stage_wb" parent="1" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=14;" value="<b>WB</b><br>Write Back" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="40" width="140" x="1080" y="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="pc" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;" value="PC" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="40" width="60" x="40" y="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="pcplus4_adder" parent="1" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;" value="+" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="40" width="40" x="40" y="200" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="imem" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#d5e8d4;strokeColor=#82b366;" value="Instruction<br>Memory" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="80" width="100" x="140" y="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ifid_reg" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#f8cecc;strokeColor=#b85450;fontStyle=1" value="IF/ID" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="180" width="40" x="280" y="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="regfile" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#d5e8d4;strokeColor=#82b366;" value="Register<br>File" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="100" width="80" x="360" y="140" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="control" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#e1d5e7;strokeColor=#9673a6;" value="Control<br>Unit" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="60" width="80" x="360" y="280" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="extend" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;" value="Extend" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="40" width="60" x="480" y="200" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="idex_reg" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#f8cecc;strokeColor=#b85450;fontStyle=1" value="ID/EX" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="260" width="40" x="560" y="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="alu_src_mux" parent="1" style="shape=trapezoid;perimeter=trapezoidPerimeter;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;rotation=90;" value="MUX" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="40" width="60" x="610" y="200" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="alu" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;" value="ALU" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="80" width="60" x="680" y="150" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="exmem_reg" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#f8cecc;strokeColor=#b85450;fontStyle=1" value="EX/MEM" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="220" width="40" x="800" y="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="dmem" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#d5e8d4;strokeColor=#82b366;" value="Data<br>Memory" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="80" width="80" x="880" y="150" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="memwb_reg" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#f8cecc;strokeColor=#b85450;fontStyle=1" value="MEM/WB" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="180" width="40" x="1040" y="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="result_mux" parent="1" style="shape=trapezoid;perimeter=trapezoidPerimeter;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;rotation=90;" value="MUX" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="40" width="60" x="1110" y="170" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="hazard" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffe6cc;strokeColor=#d79b00;" value="Hazard<br>Detection" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="60" width="80" x="360" y="380" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="forwarding" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffe6cc;strokeColor=#d79b00;" value="Forwarding<br>Unit" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="60" width="80" x="680" y="280" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="pc_to_imem" edge="1" parent="1" source="pc" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;" target="imem" value="PC"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="imem_to_ifid" edge="1" parent="1" source="imem" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;" target="ifid_reg" value="Instr[31:0]"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="note" parent="1" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#666666;fillColor=#f5f5f5;align=left;verticalAlign=top;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=11;fontColor=#333333;" value="<b>Template Instructions:</b><br>1. Modify module names and sizes<br>2. Add/remove pipeline registers as needed<br>3. Draw connections between modules<br>4. Add control signals (use thin lines)<br>5. Add data buses (use thick lines with [31:0] labels)<br>6. Delete hazard/forwarding units if not needed<br>7. Adjust colors to your preference" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="140" width="280" x="40" y="480" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="legend_title" parent="1" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=12;" value="<b>Legend:</b>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="80" x="1280" y="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="legend_pipeline" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#f8cecc;strokeColor=#b85450;" value="Pipeline Register" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="120" x="1280" y="150" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="legend_memory" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#d5e8d4;strokeColor=#82b366;" value="Memory" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="120" x="1280" y="190" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="legend_alu" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;" value="ALU/PC" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="120" x="1280" y="230" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="legend_mux" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;" value="MUX/Extend" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="120" x="1280" y="270" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="legend_control" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#e1d5e7;strokeColor=#9673a6;" value="Control" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="120" x="1280" y="310" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.div:
Template Instructions:
1. Modify module names and sizes
2. Add/remove pipeline registers as needed
3. Draw connections between modules
4. Add control signals (use thin lines)
5. Add data buses (use thick lines with [31:0] labels)
6. Delete hazard/forwarding units if not needed
7. Adjust colors to your preference
